Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}HP、SP回復能力がアップします。
Effect: HP回復100アップ{nl}SP回復100アップ{nl}再生時間5秒ダウン
Name: HP、SP回復力アップ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}全てのステータス能力値がアップします。
Effect: 全てのステータス能力値10%アップ
Name: ステータスアップ

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}{#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [突] {/}{/}{nl}敵を武器の先で強く突き後ろに押し出します。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman2\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: スラスト
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/}{nl}強い攻撃で敵にダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman1\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Penetration');", "", "if (abil != null  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Swordman_Bash\"  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    return pc.SR + skill.SklSR + abil.Level;", "}", "return pc.SR + skill.SklSR"]
Name: バッシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}覚悟を決めて一時的に自分の攻撃力をアップさせる代わりに防御力をダウンさせます。
Effect: 物理攻撃力 #{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}物理防御力#{CaptionRatio2}#ダウン{nl}持続時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 10 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 2) + ((skill.Level / 5) * (Math.pow((pc.STR * 0.5) ,  0.8)))", "var Swordman13_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman13\")", "", "if (Swordman13_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * (1 + Swordman13_abil.Level * 0.01);", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 5 + (skill.Level - 1) + ((skill.Level / 5) * (Math.pow((pc.STR * 0.3) ,  0.5)))", "var Swordman13_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman13\")", "", "if (Swordman13_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * (1 + Swordman13_abil.Level * 0.01);", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Name: デアデビル
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}自分の攻撃の威力をアップさせます。
Effect: 追加ダメージ+#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}攻撃回数 #{CaptionRatio}#回{nl}持続時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var statBonus = 0;", "var byAbilRate = 0;", "statBonus = Math.floor((pc.STR * 0.1 + pc.DEX * 0.2) * skill.Level)", "var Swordman14_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Swordman14\")", "", "if (Swordman14_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    byAbilRate = Swordman14_abil.Level * 0.01;", "}", "value = 5 + (skill.Level - 1) * 1.5 + statBonus;", "value = value + (value * byAbilRate);", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}一時的にダメージを受けても身体が硬直せず、押されたり倒れたりしなくなります。また、状態異常に対する効果抵抗率も上昇します。
Effect: 持続時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Swordman29')", "var value = 14 + skill.Level * 1", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + 5", "}", "return value"]

Name: アンボブロー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}盾の縁を使って敵を攻撃します。攻撃を受けた敵はノックバックし、石化や氷結状態の敵を攻撃すると追加ダメージを与えます。攻撃が的中すると物理攻撃力に盾の物理防御力が30%追加で適用され、挑発数値が50倍適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: リムブロー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}盾を叩いて周辺の敵を挑発し、自分を追わせます。挑発状態になったモンスターは移動速度がアップし、30秒間挑発スキルの効果が適用されません。
Effect: 適用対象数#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}挑発持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}#{CaptionRatio2}#秒間最大挑発対象数#{CaptionRatio3}#アップ
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var buffTime = 5;", "", "if (pc != null) {", "    var abilPeltasta32 = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta32\");", "", "    if (abilPeltasta32 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilPeltasta32, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "        buffTime = buffTime + TryGetProp(abilPeltasta32, \"Level\");", "    }", "}", "", "return buffTime;"]
Name: スワッシュバックリング
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}自分の物理、魔法防御力をアップさせます。デアデビルと一緒に使うことはできません。
Effect: 物理、魔法防御力#{CaptionRatio}#%アップ{nl}物理攻撃力#{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 100", "var abilPeltasta34 = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta34\")", "", "if (abilPeltasta34 != null  &&  abilPeltasta34.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = 200", "}", "return value;"]
Name: ガーディアン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}盾を投げて敵を攻撃します。投げた盾は指定の位置に落ち、自分の物理防御力が装備の数値分ダウンします。盾は拾うか、一定の時間が経つと自動的に手元に戻り、ダウンしていた物理防御力も元に戻ります。攻撃が的中すると物理攻撃力に盾の物理防御力が30%追加で適用され、挑発数値が50倍適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Peltasta14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var Peltasta4_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Peltasta4')", "", "if (Peltasta4_abil != null  &&  1 == Peltasta4_abil.ActiveState) {", "    return pc.SR + skill.SklSR + Peltasta4_abil.Level;", "}", "return pc.SR + skill.SklSR"]
Name: シールドロブ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}盾を前に構える積極的な防御スタンスに転換します。ブロックがアップします。
Effect: ブロック #{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}持続時間30秒

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}武器を使って防御の姿勢を取ります。防御された直後の敵は突き攻撃に弱い状態になります。
Effect: ブロック#{CaptionRatio2}#アップ
Name: クロスガード
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}剣を円を描くように振り、前方の敵に連続攻撃を加えます。クラウンデバフにかかった敵に与えるダメージが2倍アップします。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  5回{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ムリネ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}敵を剣の広い面で打ち、横に押しやります。敵は防具破壊状態になります。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander25\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: スカルスウィング
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}敵を左右に大きく斬り付けます。{nl}出血状態の敵に追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  2回{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Highlander29\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: スカイライナー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect: クリティカル発生#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}ブロック#{CaptionRatio3}#アップ{nl}回避#{CaptionRatio2}#ダウン{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 15 * skill.Level", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Hoplite9');", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * 2;", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: ジャベリン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]-[突]{/}{/}{nl}前方の敵を突いてダメージを与え、突き攻撃に弱い状態にします。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持続時間6秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Hoplite26\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: スピアランジ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}ジャンプ中や空中にいる時、下にいる敵を強く踏み付けてダメージを与えます。キャラクターの高さ、靴防具の防御能力値によって攻撃力がアップします。

Name: ストンピングキック
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}一時的に周辺の敵の防御力をダウンさせ、周辺にいる対象の数に比例して攻撃力がアップします。
Effect: 適用対象#{CaptionRatio}#体{nl}物理防御力最大#{CaptionRatio2}#ダウン{nl}適用対象数1体ごとに物理攻撃力#{CaptionRatio3}#アップ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var Warcry_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Barbarian1')", "var value = 5;", "", "if (Warcry_abil != null  &&  1 == Warcry_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = 5 + Warcry_abil.Level;", "}", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionRatio3: ["var Warcry_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian11\")", "var value = skill.Level * 4", "", "if (Warcry_abil != null  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value * (1 + Warcry_abil.Level * 0.01)", "}", "value = Math.floor(value)", "return value"]
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 30", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Barbarian2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 2", "}", "return value;"]
Name: ウォークライ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}基本攻撃の速度がアップし、一体の敵を連続して攻撃するほど、どんどん攻撃力がアップする状態になります。
Effect: 1重複ごとに攻撃力1.5%アップ{nl}最大重複#{CaptionRatio2}#回{nl}基本攻撃速度#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["", "if (null != pc) {", "    var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Barbarian22');", "", "    if (null != abil  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "        return skill.Level", "    }", "}", "", "return skill.Level * 2"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}敵を掴み、遠心力を利用して思いきり放り投げます。当たった敵は命中がダウンします。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}回転数9周{nl}投げる距離150
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "    } else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]
Name: ジャイアントスウィング

Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rodelero11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: シールドチャージ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/}{nl}敵の下部を強く攻撃します。敵は一時的に行動できなくなる場合があります。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}{#339999}{ol}[スタン]{/}{/}持続時間1秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rodelero14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: モンタノ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}盾で敵を強く打ち下ろして、ダメージを与えます。敵は一定の確率で闇状態に陥ることがあります。石化、氷結状態の敵を攻撃すると追加ダメージを与えます。攻撃が的中すると物理攻撃力に盾の物理防御力が30%追加で適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}{#339999}{ol}[闇]{/}{/}持続時間3秒{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Rodelero17\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: タージスマッシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}盾で敵の行動を妨害し、アンバランス状態にします。{nl}アンバランス状態になった敵は攻撃を受けると一定の確率でノックダウンされます。攻撃が的中すると物理攻撃力に盾の物理防御力が30%追加で適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}防御力#{CaptionRatio}#%ダウン{nl}{#339999}{ol}[アンバランス]{/}{/}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 5;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Rodelero25')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level;", "}", "return value;"]

Name: アースウェーブ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}コンパニオン搭乗中の移動速度がアップします。
Effect: 移動速度#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: トロット
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}前方へ突進して敵に衝突し、ダメージを与えます。ディスローンデバフにかかった敵に追加ダメージを与えます。スキル使用後、1.5秒間追加使用ができます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#{nl}搭乗状態で使用可能

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}武器と防具をメンテナンスして性能を一時的に向上させる商店を開設します。防具は上半身、下半身、盾のみ可能です。ダンジョン地域に設置すると価格が上がります。

Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 500 + skill.Level * 50 + pc.INT", "var Squire4 = GetAbility(pc, 'Squire4');", "", "if (Squire4 != null  &&  1 == Squire4.ActiveState  &&  skill.Level >= 3) {", "    value = value + Squire4.Level * 5", "}", "return value"]
Name: 装備メンテナンス
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}海賊団の戦闘能力を高揚させる海賊旗を掲げます。海賊旗の周辺で連続して敵を打撃すると、コンボが発動します。 コンボを300回達成するとミサイル攻撃のダメージがアップするフィーバーバフが発動されます。コンボは海賊旗を掲げた後1回のみ発動し、PTに属していなければなりません。
Effect: 旗の持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}ミサイル攻撃ダメージ #{CaptionRatio}#%アップ{nl}フィーバー持続時間10秒
Name: ジョリーロジャー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}敵をフックで捕獲します。

Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 4 + skill.Level * 1;", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  zone == 'pvp_Mine') {", "    value = value * 0.5;", "}", "return value;"]
Name: アイアンフック
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}[アイアンフック]で捕獲した敵を引きずります。敵は引きずられる度にダメージを受けます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x #{CaptionRatio}#回
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Corsair11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: キールハウリング
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}ファランクスフォーメーションに転換します。全部隊員のブロック能力を最前列の3人に集中させます。
Effect: 追加ブロック#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}2秒ごとにSP1%ずつ消耗
Name: ファランクス
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect: 部隊員に攻撃力#{CaptionRatio2}#%伝達{nl}攻撃時、#{CaptionRatio}#連打{nl}2秒ごとにSP1%ずつ消耗
Name: ウェッジ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}シルトロンフォーメーションに転換します。全部隊員が武器を構えて止まり、敵の突進を防ぎます。
Effect: 2秒ごとにSP1%ずつ消耗{nl}1レベルマスター
Name: シルトロン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}テストゥードフォーメーションに転換します。部隊員全員の防御力をアップさせ、ゆっくり移動します。
Effect: 攻撃力#{CaptionRatio}#%ダウン{nl}ダウンした攻撃力の分だけ防御力アップ{nl}追加防御力#{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}2秒ごとにSP1%ずつ消耗
Name: テストゥード
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}フォーメーションの方向をリーダーの視線の方向に合わせて整えます。
Effect: リーダーの方向に合わせて再整列{nl}1レベルマスター
Name: ローテート
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}隊員を招集するフォーメーションになります。フォーメーションに入った隊員はしばらくの間クールタイムが半分になります。持続時間はスキルレベル、メンバー数によって増加します。
Effect: クールタイム50%ダウン{nl}持続時間最小#{CaptionRatio}#秒～最大#{CaptionRatio2}#秒
Name: 特戦隊型
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}敵に与えるダメージはアップしますが、自分が受けるダメージもアップします。
Effect: 追加ダメージ#{CaptionRatio}#%アップ{nl}受けるダメージ#{CaptionRatio2}#%アップ{nl}持続時間120秒
Name: ディーズオブヴァロー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}剣を逆さに持って、柄の部分で敵を打ちます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Doppelsoeldner12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var skillSR = skill.SklSR;", "var abil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Doppelsoeldner24')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    skillSR = skillSR + abil.Level;", "}", "var value = pc.SR + skillSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "return value"]
Name: モルトシュラーク
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}一定の攻撃回数内で敵を退治すると、経験値とドロップするアイテムの数が2倍になります。ただし、効果が持続している間は受けるダメージが3倍になり、戦闘不能に陥ると耐久度の減少量も大幅に増加します。
Effect: 攻撃#{CaptionRatio}#回制限{nl}経験値2倍、ドロップするアイテムの数2倍
Name: ダブルペイアーン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Doppelsoeldner16\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ツーケン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]-[斬]{/}{/}{nl}片手で剣を大きく振り回し、前方の広範囲の敵にダメージを与えます。[プレート]系以外が防御タイプの敵はしばらくの間、斬属性攻撃に弱くなります。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  3回{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Doppelsoeldner18\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var skillSR = skill.SklSR;", "var abil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Doppelsoeldner24')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    skillSR = skillSR + abil.Level;", "}", "var value = pc.SR + skillSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "return value"]
Name: ズバークハウ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect_SkillSR: ["var skillSR = skill.SklSR;", "var abil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Doppelsoeldner24')", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    skillSR = skillSR + abil.Level;", "}", "var value = pc.SR + skillSR;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1", "}", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [突]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}レイピアで敵の手を打ち、武器を落とさせます。相手は武器を拾うまで武器の効果が適用されません。(武器は一定時間後に自動回収されます。)
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}敵の武器脱着時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Fencer9\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: アタックオフェール
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}装着した盾の物理防御力を無力化する代わりに、突き攻撃時のクリティカル威力が増すような姿勢をとります。
Effect: クリティカルダメージ増加量#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: エペ・ギャルド
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]-[突]{/}{/}{nl}敵に3連続突き攻撃をします。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  3回
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Fencer10\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: フレーシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}所持中の火薬を爆発させて周辺の敵を攻撃します。このスキルの使用者もダメージを受け、体力が足りないと戦闘不能状態になる場合があります。分身がスキルを使用すると忍法 分身の術が解除されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}HP#{CaptionRatio2}#消耗{nl}忍法用爆薬5個消費
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Shinobi3\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}自分の分身を作ります。分身は本体と一緒に行動し、一部のスキルは分身も一緒に使うことができます。分身が使用するスキルは特性適用ができません。分身が真似するスキルを使用すると、分身1体あたりのSPとクールタイムが追加でアップします。
Effect: 持続時間#{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}分身 #{CaptionRatio2}#体召喚{nl}追加クールタイム{nl}[2 + スキルクールタイムの 10%] x 分身数{nl}追加SP消耗[10% x 分身数]

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}シールドの端をつかんで大きく振り回し、前方の敵を攻撃します。{nl}攻撃が的中すると物理攻撃力に盾の物理防御力が30%追加で適用されます。{nl}詠唱者から一定距離以上離れている敵には追加ダメージと出血デバフが適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#{nl}{#339999}{ol}[出血]{/}{/} 持続時間10秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Murmillo9\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Effect_SkillSR: ["var byAbil = 0;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Murmillo16');", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    byAbil = pc.SR + skill.SklSR;", "}", "return Math.floor(pc.SR + skill.SklSR + byAbil)"]
Name: スキュータムヒット
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}選ばれしドラグーンのみが被ることを許されたヘルメットを着用します。ヘルメットを着用すると、すべてのドラグーンのスキルが強化され敵に与えるダメージがアップしますが、SP消耗がダウンします。再使用するとヘルメットを外します。
Effect: ドラグーンスキルダメージ50%アップ{nl}ドラグーンスキルのSP消耗50%ダウン{nl}1レベルマスター
Name: ドラグーンヘルメット
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'DragoonHelmet_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.Job == 'Dragoon') {", "    value = value - (value * 0.5)", "}", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}指定されたギルドメンバーを自分の前に召喚します。そのギルドメンバーの同意が必要です。
Effect: ギルドメンバー#{CaptionRatio}#名召喚可能
Name: ギルドメンバー召喚
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}指定したギルドメンバーの隣にワープします。インスタンスダンジョンにいるギルドメンバーのところへ移動することができません。
Effect: 選択したギルドメンバーがいる場所へ移動
Name: ギルドメンバーのもとへ移動
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}ギルドタワーの追加機能を使用できるようにしてくれます。ギルドタワーは'ギルドタワー' アイテムを使用して設置できます。{nl}1レベル：ワープ利用可能{nl}2レベル：倉庫使用可能{nl}3レベル：ギルド成長可能{nl}4レベル：ギルドクエスト利用可能{nl}5レベル：ギルドアジト利用可能
Effect: ギルドタワー機能アップ
Name: ギルドタワー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}周辺にいる全てのギルドメンバーの製造速度を短縮させる旗を設置します。ギルドタワー付近、街、ギルドアジトでのみ使用可能です。{nl}ギルドマスターのみスキルを使用できます。
Effect: 製造時間#{CaptionRatio}#%短縮
Name: 製造時間減少
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Piercing]{/}{/}{nl}ギルドマスター周辺にいるギルドメンバーの移動速度を最大値までアップさせます。ギルドマスターから離れると効果が失われます。{nl}周辺の敵は移動速度がダウンします。
Effect: 持続時間#{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}移動速度#{CaptionRatio2}#ダウン
Name: バトルオーダーズ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/}{nl}前方に向かって剣を左右に振ってから斬り上げ攻撃をします。{nl}バトルオーダーズデバフがかかっている敵には追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  3回{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Templar1\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: モータルスラッシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\") == \"YES\") {", "    var bunshinBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"Bunshin_Debuff\")", "    var bunsinCount = GetBuffArg(bunshinBuff)", "    value = value + (value * (bunsinCount * 0.1))", "}", "", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]-[突]{/}{/}{nl}前方の敵へ槍を差し込み、一時的に敵の攻撃力または防御力をダウンさせます。敵の召喚物を攻撃すると位置を移動させることができます。

Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Lancer7\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: スピルアタック
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理]-[突]{/}{/}{nl}槍を大きく伸ばして攻撃します。クラッシュ状態の敵には追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Lancer8\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: クインテイン
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}戦闘のスタートに先立って戦意を固めます。敵のブロックを貫通する確率がアップし、攻撃を受けた敵は一定確率でブロック値がダウンします。
Effect: ブロック貫通#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}敵のブロックダウン量#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: コメンス
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * addsp", "var GHabil =  GetAbility(pc, 'Remain')", "", "if (GHabil != null) {", "    value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "}", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]
