Effect: 発動スキル{nl}*ディソナンツ{nl}  ：失敗すると持続時間が半分に短縮{nl}*ヴィーゲンリート{nl}  ：失敗すると夢うつつの命中ダウン効果が半分にダウン{nl}*マシュレデスリート{nl}  ：失敗すると持続時間が半分に短縮{nl}*リートデスベルトバウム{nl}  ：失敗すると持続時間が半分に短縮
Name: シュテグライフシュフィル
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}HPを回復したり、敵にダメージを与える魔法陣を生成します。浮いている対象には適用されません。HP回復量は対象の最大HPに比例します。詠唱者の知能と精神の能力値によって追加回復します。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}治癒係数#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}魔法陣持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}ヒール魔法陣 #{CaptionRatio3}#個
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ヒール
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}仲間の1レベルの状態異常を解除したり、敵にダメージを与える魔法陣を生成します。
Effect: #{CaptionRatio3}#秒ごとに攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}攻撃回数#{CaptionRatio}#回{nl}魔法陣持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio3: ["var value = 0.4;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric1\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = 0.2;", "}", "return value;"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Cleric11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: キュア
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 0;", "var abilKriwi18 = GetAbility(pc, \"Kriwi18\");", "", "if (abilKriwi18 != null  &&  abilKriwi18.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + (215 + ((Math.pow((pc.INT + pc.MNA) ,  0.9)) * (1 + skill.Level / 15)) + (skill.Level * 43))", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Name: ディヴァインスティグマ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic]{/}{/}{nl}自分とPTメンバーのプラスバフ効果時間をアップさせる魔法陣を生成します。アップする時間は最大で20秒までです。無敵効果は適用されません。
Effect: 持続時間#{CaptionRatio2}#%アップ{nl}ホーリーパウダー5個消費
Name: メルスティス
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}ゾンビたちが好むサルの骸骨を使って任意の場所へ導きます。敵には一定の時間ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 召喚されたゾンビ必要{nl}1レベルマスター
Name: テトママクラ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}倒した敵をゾンビにする魔法陣を描きます。ゾンビの能力値は死んだ敵の能力値の影響を受けます。詠唱者の知能と精神の能力値によってゾンビの体力と力がさらにアップします。
Effect: 魔法陣#{CaptionTime}#秒持続{nl}最大ゾンビ8体召喚{nl}レベルが上がるとゾンビダメージがアップします。
Name: ゾンビフィー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}仲間に痛みを感じなくする護符を投げます。 この効果にかかっている間はダメージを受けませんが、効果が終わると同時に累積したダメージを一度に受けます。
Effect: 無敵持続時間 #{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: マカンダル
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}ゾンビたちに祭りを開くよう指示します。ゾンビに触れた敵はダメージを受けます。ゾンビたちの力ステータスの平均値が追加ダメージとして適用されます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}最大持続時間10秒{nl}召喚されたゾンビが必要
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Bokor18\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ブワカイマン

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}死のロア（精霊）であるサムディを象徴する紋様を地面に設置します。この紋様周辺の自分とゾンビたちの移動速度と最大HPがアップします。自分には半分の効果だけ適用されます。
Effect: 最大HP#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}移動速度 #{CaptionRatio2}#アップ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}紋様持続時間15秒
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 3 + skill.Level * 1", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1  ||  zone == 'pvp_Mine') {", "    value = value * 0.5", "}", "return value"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Buff] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}力のロア（精霊）であるオグーを象徴する紋様を地面に設置します。この紋様周辺のゾンビたちのダメージと力の能力値、広域攻撃率がアップします。

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike] - [Physical]{/}{/}{nl}近くの敵を沈黙状態にする神聖な世界樹を彫刻します。

Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 12 + skill.Level * 3", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Dievdirbys5\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 10", "}", "return value"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}自分の幽体を離脱させます。幽体は本体の周辺でのみ動くことができます。
Effect: 幽体移動範囲#{CaptionRatio}#
Name: アウトオブボディ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Name: ターンアンデッド
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}周辺の敵を外に押し出してしばらく入って来られなくする防御の壁を建てます。壁の内側にいる味方の魔法防御力をアップさせます。
Effect: 魔法防御力#{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}聖水10個消費
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var mdefrate = pc.MDEF * (0.1 * skill.Level)", "var mdefadd = 30 + (skill.Level * 20) + pc.MNA + mdefrate", "return Math.floor(mdefadd)"]
Name: バリア
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}背教者に下す審判で敵を攻撃します。攻撃された敵は炎、氷、雷、地、毒属性の抵抗力がダウンします。また、スタン状態の敵に追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  2回{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#{nl}各属性抵抗力#{CaptionRatio2}#ダウン
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Paladin17\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: コンビクション
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}範囲内の味方の物理防御力と魔法防御力をアップさせます。またアップした防御力分の神聖属性追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 物理防御力 #{CaptionRatio}#アップ{nl}魔法防御力 #{CaptionRatio2}#アップ{nl}持続時間10秒{nl}聖水 #{SpendItemCount}#個消費{nl}1秒あたりのSP #{CaptionRatio3}#消費
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var DEF = pc.DEF", "var defRate = DEF * (0.1 * skill.Level)", "return Math.floor(defRate)"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var MDEF = pc.MDEF;", "var mdefRate = MDEF * (0.1 * skill.Level)", "return Math.floor(mdefRate)"]
Name: サンクチュアリ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}両手鈍器で敵を強く打ち下ろします。
Effect: 攻撃力 #{SkillFactor}#% x 7回{nl}広域攻撃率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Paladin21\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/}{nl}全身の皮膚を鋼鉄のように硬くし、敵の攻撃を弾いてダメージを与えます。
Effect: 対象の物理攻撃力の#{CaptionRatio}#%分 反射{nl}最大持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}遠距離発射体、魔法防御不可
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 50 + skill.Level * 10", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Monk2\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  1 == abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + abil.Level * 5", "}", "return value"]

Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x  2回
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Monk12\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: 双鎖功
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Monk10')", "var ActiveState = TryGetProp(abil, \"ActiveState\")", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "", "if (abil != null  &&  ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value - (value * 0.3)", "}", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Name: 弾指神通
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Name: インダルゲンティア
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [毒]{/}{/}{nl}指定した位置に一時的に植物が生えます。そのエリア内に入ったモンスターは一時的に植物型モンスターと判定されます。該当地域に入った見方は花の香りバフを受けてHPが回復します。敵が入った場合は草の毒バフにかかって持続的にダメージを受けます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}花の香り回復量#{CaptionTime}#{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 10 + skill.Level", "var Druid1_abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Druid1\")", "", "if (Druid1_abil != null  &&  1 == Druid1_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value + Druid1_abil.Level", "}", "return value"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Druid15\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: コルタスマタ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}一時的に狼に変身します。変身すると周辺の敵を挑発します。狼スキルを使用すると追加挑発数値を獲得します。変身状態ではキャラクタースキルを使用できず、持続的にSPを消耗します。変身状態を維持する間、一部の能力値がアップし、8秒ごとにHPを最大体力の2%ずつ回復します。ダッシュ使用が可能です。
Effect: 狼スキル使用可能{nl}追加ダメージ#{CaptionRatio}#%アップ{nl}クリティカル発生#{CaptionRatio2}#アップ{nl}基本移動速度10アップ{nl}最大HP 2倍アップ{nl}物理、魔法防御力50%アップ{nl}ブロック貫通400アップ{nl}最大持続時間30秒{nl}1秒あたりのSP消耗量91
Name: ライカンスロピー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Effect: 1レベルマスター
Name: スイッチジェンダー
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}目の前に動く魔法陣を召喚します。魔法陣の上では移動中にダメージを受けず、すべての攻撃が命中します。
Effect: 魔法陣の移動速度 #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 30;", "var Oracle14_abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Oracle14');", "", "if (Oracle14_abil != null  &&  1 == Oracle14_abil.ActiveState) {", "    value = value / 3;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]
Name: フォアテル
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}指定した敵の最大HPに基づいて固定的なダメージを与える代わりに、攻撃後は与えたダメージの2倍、敵のHPが持続的に回復します。フィールドボスモンスターには適用されません。
Effect: 最大HPの#{CaptionRatio}#%～#{CaptionRatio2}#%ダメージ{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒
Name: ツイストオブフェイト
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Buff] - [Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}一時的に超再生能力を付与する魔法陣を設置します。この魔法陣を踏んだ自分または仲間は、ダメージを受けても魔法陣を踏んだ時点の体力に素早く回復します。
Effect: 持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}HP#{CaptionRatio}#回復
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 15 + skill.Level * 5", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "    value = Math.min(27, value);", "}", "var value = 15 + skill.Level * 5", "", "if (IsPVPServer(pc) == 1) {", "    value = Math.min(27, value);", "}", "return value;"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [炎]{/}{/}{nl}状態異常になった敵を燃やします。敵に適用されていた状態異常の数に比例し、炎状態の持続時間が長くなります。
Effect: 0.4秒あたり攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}基本持続時間#{CaptionRatio2}#秒
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"PlagueDoctor2\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]

SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}女神の車輪を召喚し、車輪に当たった敵にダメージを与える。指定した位置に着いた車輪は爆発しながら周辺の敵を攻撃する。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}衝突すると魔法攻撃力の100%ダメージ{nl}悪魔型対象100%追加ダメージ{nl}最大#{CaptionRatio2}#回衝突
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Kabbalist8\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: メルカバ

Name: ペアーオブアングイッシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/}{nl}ホイールを召喚して周囲の敵にダメージを与えます。ホイール周辺で魔法を使用する敵は、ホイールの攻撃範囲外に出てもダメージを受けます。
Effect: 0.3秒あたりの攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}拷問道具2個必要
Effect_CaptionTime: ["var value = 10;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor20\")", "", "if (abil != null  &&  abil.ActiveState == 1) {", "    value = value + abil.Level", "}", "return value"]
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor13\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ブレーキングホイール
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [打]{/}{/} {#7AE4FF}{ol}[{img tooltip_speedofatk}攻撃速度]{/}{/}{nl}武器を高く持ち上げた後、強く振り下ろします。鈍器または両手鈍器を使うと追加ダメージを与えます。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}広域攻撃比率#{SkillSR}#
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor10\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: ゴッドスマッシュ
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var lvUpSpendSpRound = Math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\") {", "", "    if (TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\") {", "        var acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "        var acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "        var acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "        value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "        SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", Math.floor(value))", "    }", "", "}", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}魔道書の力を解放して敵にダメージを与えます。ダメージを受けた敵は知能と精神が半減し、攻撃を受ける度に自分の魔法攻撃力に比例した追加ダメージを受けます。魔法攻撃時の消費SPが2倍になります。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#% x 7回{nl}被撃者の魔法攻撃力の#{CaptionRatio}#%追加ダメージ{nl}持続時間10秒{nl}最大7体適用
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Inquisitor14\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: マレウスマレフィカーム

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [斬]{/}{/}{nl}巨大なハサミを召喚し、前方の敵を連続で攻撃します。スキル使用中は敵に攻撃を受けてもキャンセルされず、悪魔型の敵に与えるダメージがアップします。

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法]{/}{/}{nl}護符を設置し、自分と周囲の仲間をモンスターに察知されないようにします。
Effect: 爆発攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}護符の持続時間#{CaptionTime}#秒{nl}効果の適用範囲#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}槐黄紙2枚必要
Effect_SkillFactor: ["var sklFactor;", "", "if (skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC') {", "    var atkType = skill.AttackType;", "    var attribute = skill.Attribute;", "    var atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "    var attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "    } else {", "    sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    return Math.floor(sklFactor);", "}", ""]

Name: ディバインパニッシュメント
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}自分の残りのSPの50%を消費し、持続時間中に聖属性追加攻撃を行います。
Effect: 持続時間40秒{nl}消耗したSP x #{CaptionRatio}#だけ追加攻撃{nl}攻撃可能回数40回
Name: ブラインドフェイス
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#DD5500}{ol}[物理] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}周辺の敵に攻撃を受けると聖属性ダメージを与えるデバフを付与します。
Effect: 攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}持続時間#{CaptionRatio}#秒{nl}攻撃可能回数10回{nl}適用対象数10
Effect_SkillFactor: ["function SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value) {", "    var abilLevel = TryGetProp(abil, \"Level\")", "    var masterAddValue = 0", "", "    if (abilLevel == 100) {", "        masterAddValue = 0.1", "    }", "    var value = value * (1 + ((abilLevel * 0.005) + masterAddValue))", "    return value", "}", "", "var value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "var abil = GetAbility(pc, \"Zealot11\")", "", "if (abil != null) {", "    value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "}", "return Math.floor(value)"]
Name: エンファシストラスト
SP: ["var basicSP = skill.BasicSP;", "var lv = skill.Level;", "var lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "var decsp = 0;", "", "if (basicSP == 0) {", "    return 0;", "}", "var abilAddSP = 0;", "abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "var value = basicSP + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES') {", "    value = value * 2", "    return Math.floor(value);", "}", "", "value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "var zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "", "if (zeminaLv > 0) {", "    decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "}", "value = value - decsp;", "", "if (value < 1) {", "    value = 1;", "}", "", "if (IsBuffApplied(pc, 'ShadowPool_Buff') == 'YES'  &&  skill.ClassName == \"Shadowmancer_ShadowPool\") {", "    value = 0;", "}", "return Math.floor(value);"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}女神の力が宿った祈祷書を読んで敵に聖属性魔法ダメージを与え、移動速度ダウン状態にします。悪魔型の敵には追加ダメージを与え、移動速度ダウン効果を強化します。
Effect: 0.#{CaptionRatio2}#秒あたりの攻撃力#{SkillFactor}#%{nl}{nl}適用対象#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}最大持続時間6秒
Effect_CaptionRatio: ["var value = 5;", "var abilExorcist2 = GetAbility(pc, \"Exorcist2\");", "", "if (abilExorcist2 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilExorcist2, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "    value = value + abilExorcist2.Level;", "}", "return value;"]
Effect_CaptionRatio2: ["var value = 5;", "var abilExorcist3 = GetAbility(pc, \"Exorcist3\");", "", "if (abilExorcist3 != null  &&  TryGetProp(abilExorcist3, \"ActiveState\") == 1) {", "    value = 25;", "}", "return value;"]

Description: {#993399}{ol}[魔法] - [聖]{/}{/}{nl}悪を追い払う強い力が宿った神聖力を発揮します。自分と周辺の味方の2ランク以下のデバフを解除し、周辺の敵に聖属性ダメージを与えます。デバフが解除される対象がゾンビの場合、そのゾンビは死亡します。
